brief_summary.textblock:
The study explores the feasibility of Eye-Movement-Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR)
      in non-specific chronic back pain.

clinical_study.brief_title: Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR) in Non-specific Chronic Back Pain

detailed_description.textblock:
The study explores the feasibility of Eye-Movement-Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR)
      in non-specific chronic back pain in a randomized controlled trial (RCT) with 6 months
      follow-up. The treatment consists of 12-sessions EMDR a 60 minutes using eye-movements for
      bilateral stimulation in addition to treatment as usual (TAU) that is compared to TAU alone.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  >= 18 years

          -  non-specific chronic low back pain >= 45 days/3 months

          -  high emotional distress caused by psychological trauma

          -  German language skills

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  specific causes of chronic back pain

          -  application for retirement pension pending

          -  ongoing psychotherapy

          -  severe physical or psychiatric comorbidity

clinical_study.official_title: Localized and Generalized Musculoskeletal Pain: Psychobiological Mechanisms and Implications for Treatment (LOGIN) - Subgroups Characterized by Psychological Trauma, Mental Comorbidity, and Psychobiological Patterns and Their Specialized Treatment - Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR) in Non-specific Chronic Back Pain

other_outcome.measure: functional and structural changes in fMRI
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline fMRI at average 6 months

other_outcome.measure: Change in the pain experience scale - Pain affect
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline pain experience scale levels at average 6 months

other_outcome.measure: Change in the Hannover functional ability questionnaire (FFbH) - disability
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline disabilty levels at average 6 months

other_outcome.description: According to the protocol by Rolke et al. (2006), developed within the Germany Research Network on Neuropathic Pain (DFNS)
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline QST profile at average 6 months

other_outcome.description: difference in pressure pain threshold before and after oscillating heat (2 min.)
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline conditioned pain modulation activity at average 6 months

other_outcome.description: Plasma levels: AEA (ng/ml), 2-AG (ng/ml), AA (ng/ml), PEA (ng/ml), OEA (ng/ml), AEA (pmol/g), 2-AG (pmol/g), AA (nmol/g), PEA (pmol/g), OEA (pmol/g),
other_outcome.measure: Change in Plasma endocannabinoids and lipids
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline endocannabinoids and lipids at average 6 months

other_outcome.measure: Change in plasma nerve growth factor levels
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline NGF levels at average 6 months

other_outcome.measure: Change in pain drawing/ the spatial extent of the pain
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline Pain extent at average 6 months

other_outcome.measure: Change in West Haven-Yale multidimensional pain inventory scores
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline West Haven-Yale multidimensional pain inventory scores at average 6 months
Change from Baseline chronic pain grade at average 6 months
Change from Baseline resilience scores at average 6 months

other_outcome.measure: Change in Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale scores
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline anxiety and depression levels at average 6 months
Change from baseline quality of life level at average 6 months
Change from Baseline somatization scores at average 6 months
Change from Baseline medication intake at average 6 months
Change from Baseline dissociation at average 6 months

other_outcome.measure: Change in Post Traumatic Diagnostic Scale
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline post traumatic diagnostic scale levels at average 6 months
after on average 6 months of treatment

other_outcome.description: % of patients eligible for inclusion that give written informed consent
other_outcome.time_frame: 6 months

other_outcome.description: % of patients that finish treatment, including pre- and post-evaluation
other_outcome.time_frame: over average 6 months of treatment

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Ministry of Education and Research

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline Pain intensity at average 6 months
